alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:27PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Payette, northwestern Canyon and eastern Malheur Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 227 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nyssa, or 8 miles south of Ontario, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fruitland around 240 PM MDT. New Plymouth around 250 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
